## EthersStabilioConnectionOptionalParams interface

Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersStabilio.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersstabilio.connect_1.md) and [EthersStabilio.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilio.connect_1.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EthersStabilioConnectionOptionalParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [frontendTag?](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnectionoptionalparams.frontendtag.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Address that will receive STBL rewards from newly created Stability Deposits by default. |
|  [userAddress?](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnectionoptionalparams.useraddress.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Address whose Trove, Stability Deposit, STBL Stake and balances will be read by default. |
|  [useStore?](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) | [EthersStabilioStoreOption](./lib-ethers.ethersstabiliostoreoption.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Create a [StabilioStore](./lib-base.stabiliostore.md) and expose it as the <code>store</code> property. |
